overview: This film captures a moment in time when vinyl recordings saw a resurgence that no one in the music industry could have predicted. Whether the popularity of vinyl will endure beyond various advances in the digital fidelity of sound recordings is anyone's guess. This film is a documentary in the sense that it documents this phenomenon through interviews with musicians and record shop owners. This film does not have a plot. It captures a moment in time when vinyl was king.
title: Just for the Record
